verses.roman:
śivānande kahiha,--āmi ei pauṣa-māse
ācambite avaśya āmi yāiba tāṅra pāśe

synonyms: śivānande kahiha—speak to Śivānanda Sena; āmi—I; ei—this; pauṣa-māse—in the month of December; ācambite—all of a sudden; avaśya—certainly; āmi—I; yāiba—shall go; tāṅra pāśe—to his place.
translation: "Please inform Śivānanda Sena that this December I shall certainly go to his home.
